sense.gloss: to bring near, to bring close, to let go near
to associate with, to bring (people) together, to let come near (of a person)

sdata.j: だれも↑火↑↓ひ↓に|↑近↑↓ちか↓づける|な。
sdata.e: Don't let anyone come near the fire.

sdata.j: ↑子供↑↓こども↓たちをナイフに|↑近↑↓ちか↓づける|な。
sdata.e: Keep the children away from the knives.

sdata.j: ↑子供↑↓こども↓を↑池↑↓いけ↓に|↑近↑↓ちか↓づける|な。
sdata.e: Keep children away from the pond.

sdata.j: ↑電流↑↓でんりゅう↓が↑流↑↓なが↓れる↑電線↑↓でんせん↓にコイルを|↑近↑↓ちか↓づける|と、コイルにも↑電気↑↓でんき↓が↑流↑↓なが↓れます。
sdata.e: When a coil is moved near to a wire with current flowing in it current flows in the coil as well.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑円↑↓えん↓↑玉↑↓だま↓を↑水↑↓みず↓に↑浮↑↓う↓かせ、そこに↑磁石↑↓じしゃく↓をゆっくり|↑近↑↓ちか↓づける|と、↑一↑↓いち↓↑円↑↓えん↓↑玉↑↓だま↓は↑磁石↑↓じしゃく↓に↑近↑↓ちか↓づく。
sdata.e: If you float a one yen coin on water and move a magnet slowly towards it then the coin will approach the magnet.

sdata.j: ↑子供↑↓こども↓を↑池↑↓いけ↓に|↑近↑↓ちか↓づける|な。
sdata.e: Keep the child away from the pond.
